templates.description: The easiest way to run WireGuard server with Web-based Admin UI.
templates.post_up_info:
Browse to http://{host-ip}:51821 to access the Web-based Admin UI.
Default password: admin
templates.note:
Browse to http://{host-ip}:51821 to access the rabbitmq-management web interface.
  • Default password: admin

env.label: ADMIN_PASSWORD
env.name: ADMIN_PASSWORD
env.description: specific the password to log in on the Web UI

env.label: SERVER_IP
env.name: SERVER_IP
env.description: specific your WAN IP, or a Dynamic DNS hostname

templates.name: wireguard-easy
templates.title: WireGuard easy
